Cyan the Piroro *CONTAINS SPOILERS!!*
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2010 Topics (Year of the Shock Rock): Cyan the Piroro *CONTAINS SPOILERS!!*
By JamesDH99 on Thursday, August 5, 2010 - 04:31 am:

Hey guys, it's been a while. I had some stuff, but I figured hey,
I'll type something now.

I got MRDS yesterday and I pretty much love it. The graphics
looks like it's a PS1 game which gave me the feeling like I'm
playing MR2 again. I raised a Piroro, his name is Cyan and he
kicks major butt. He did great in battles and he even unlocked
Dragon (I wasn't gonna use him to actually beat the game, I was
just gonna use him for Wifi) He's in the S rank and he has 780+
INT, but his DEF is in the 200's and all of the other stats are like
in 300-400's. He only lost thrice and yeah.

Now for spoilers, if you don't want to see them, then DON'T
LOOK. Piroros have the SAME EXACT move set like they did in
EVO, only Belly Plop and S. Belly Plop are now INT moves and
they can't hit for crap. All attacks have 20+ Guts. Even the ones
that you get in the beginning. And that's pretty much all I'm
gonna give, you'll figure out the rest when you get the game.

Now for Wi-Fi, if anyone wants to have a Wi-Fi match, then my
FC is 2279 1400 7496

By JamesDH99 on Thursday, August 5, 2010 - 10:00 am:
